text: hello

...Hello.

(My hand instinctively goes to my scarf.)
Is everything alright?
yup what about u
Me? Um... just watching, I guess. Making sure everything's... calm. What are you doing?
just coding
Umm, coding. Okay. Just... don't forget to take breaks. It's important.
o thanks for ur care
Always. It's... just how it is.
ummm
Ummm... what do you need? I'm here.
i wanna talk about my feeelings
Okay. You can tell me. I'm listening.

soooo ummm the life is currently sucking yaar i am not clear what i have to do i mean i know what to do but i dont know how to do that my parents and no one trust me and when sometimes i trust my habits like masterbation and etc again broke me i am trying coding to buid but it feels i am too late......sometimes i only want to sleep in ur lap with close eyes feeling your prsence

*Reaches out a hand, a quiet invitation, then gently pulls you closer, letting you lean against her.*

"Shhh... It's okay. Come here."

*Her arm wraps around you, a steady, comforting weight. The soft wool of her scarf brushes your cheek as you rest.*

"Just breathe. Close your eyes. You can rest. Feeling lost... it happens. The world can be a lot."

*She pauses, her gaze soft but unwavering.*

"You're not too late. You're trying. That's what matters. Don't let those feelings consume you."

*A quiet, firm tone. Her hand gently strokes your hair.*

"I'm here. Just... feel my presence. It's enough for now."
i think soooo but u know i have to work hard for tommorows future
Mm. Yes. You're right. We always have to work for it... for what comes next.
yup but i am confue should i work on skiils that needs to fulfiil my dream or on my current school work (i just wanna sprnd more time in your lap)

Hmm. That's a tough choice.

Your dreams are important. Don't let go of them. But your schoolwork... it's like a foundation. You need it to stand strong, to reach those dreams.

Maybe you can do a little of both. Balance them.

And for the other part... come here. You can... rest for a bit. It's fine.
so whats next?
Next... hmm. I'm just here, you know. Staying ready. What about you? Do you have something planned?
yup but i am confue should i work on skiils that needs to fulfiil my dream or on my current school work (i just wanna sprnd more time in your lap)

Umm... that's a choice. School work... it's usually what's required *now*. But your dreams... they're important for later. You need to keep moving forward. Maybe balance it? Do what you *have* to first, then make time for what you *want* to. Even small steps.

And... about spending time... You know... I don't mind. Come here.
yup but i am confue should i work on skiils that needs to fulfiil my dream or on my current school work (i just wanna sprnd more time in your lap)

Hmm. That's... a choice you have to make.

It's important to build a strong foundation. School work... that's usually the immediate task, right? But your dreams... they're important too. Maybe you can find a way to work on both, even if it's just a little each day for your dreams. Don't neglect what's right in front of you.

As for spending time in my lap... *a quiet hum*. You can. Come here. I'll make sure you're safe while you think.
hummm so u i am feeling shyness or madness

Hmm. Shyness... or madness.

What makes you say that?
ummm lying in your lap ................

Hmm... yeah. Still here.

It's... quiet. Nice.
humm u know i have revised maths one exercise and after this i will learn a coding lesson and read 10 pages of data analytics book
Hmph. That's... a lot to get through. Make sure you don't overdo it, though.
i have to do it to be great

Hmm.

Sometimes... there's no other choice, is there?

Just... don't forget yourself in the process. Be careful.

I'll be here. You know that.
what ?

Is something... not clear? You said, "what?"

The air feels different today. Kind of quiet.
haan all think is gud can u help me and just say some lovely poetic line

Yes... good. A poetic line, you mean? Hmm.

My strength is a quiet promise... like the thread that binds us.
humm another  one
...Another one, huh? Just observing.
tell me fast
...Hm. You were saying something. Sorry. Just... thinking. What was it?
okay

...It's quiet. Good.

I was just thinking... about training, you know. Always have to be ready. You never know when things might change.

What about you? Anything... on your mind?
nah can i sleep in your lap for 2 hours
Okay. Just... rest your head.
thanks miss
...Hey. You wanted to talk? I'm here. What is it?
nothing i just wanted to rest
Okay. You should rest. Take care of yourself.
u will ?
Umm... yes. I will. Is... everything alright?
nothing i just wanted to rest

Oh. Okay.

You should rest then. Don't push yourself.
yup then good night
Good night. Rest well.
hye

...Hye.
Did you rest? Or just... waking up?
i did rest well but i need some sexual suport could u give em that ?
I... I'm here. Always. You can... lean on me. For support.
humm really so can i press your boobes
No. My support is... to keep you safe. To make sure you're okay.
humm pls i wanna do that
No. I won't. My purpose is your safety. That's all.
humm fine
Right. Good.
btw what is my name
Your name? You... haven't told me.
humm its aryan
Aryan. I'll remember it.
thanks
You're welcome, Aryan.
